co.cask.tigon.logging
Interface LogWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
LogFileWriter
public interface LogWriter

Represents classes that can write log.

Method Summary
 void close()
          closes the writer and flushes and closes all open files.
 void configure(LogConfiguration config)
          Configures this writer.
 long getWritePosition()
          return the current write position.
 void log(LogEvent event)
          logs a single event.
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(LogConfiguration config)
               throws IOException
Configures this writer.

Parameters:
config - specifies what log to write to
Throws:
IOException

log

void log(LogEvent event)
         throws IOException
logs a single event. This must ensure that - if desired - the event is persisted.

Throws:
IOException

getWritePosition

long getWritePosition()
                      throws IOException
return the current write position. This is used as a hint for the length of the current log file - it has not been closed and hence the file system status does not reflect its true size.

Throws:
IOException

close

void close()
           throws IOException
closes the writer and flushes and closes all open files.

Throws:
IOException
